alert.note: Alert for Eastern Louisa; Fluvanna; Goochland; Western Hanover; Western Louisa (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 5:11PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...An area of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Louisa, central Goochland, west central Caroline, northwestern Hanover and northeastern Fluvanna Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 510 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Louisa, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, pea size hail and locally heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Louisa, Mineral, Hadensville, Palmyra, Lake Monticello, Gum Spring, Oilville, Ferncliff, Kents Store, Troy, Ladysmith, Bumpass, Montpelier, Boswells Tavern, Gordonsville, Chilesburg, Orchid, Nancy Wrights Corner, Wares Crossroads and Ruther Glen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Louisa; Fluvanna; Goochland; Western Hanover; Western Louisa
